Class providing functions for the expansion of a query

Constructor Detail

Thesaurus

Constructor without an existing connection to the dictionary database. Connection is created.

Constructor with an existing connection to the dictionary database.

Method Detail

expand

public org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet expand(org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet query)
Method expand Calls the default expansion method. The default is expanding by synonymes as well as by direct sons.

expandBySynonymes

public org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet expandBySynonymes(org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet query)
Method expandBySynonymes Finds synonymes for every word in the query. Synonymes can be father or son of other synonymes.

expandBySons

public org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet expandBySons(org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet query)
Method expandBySons Finds the direct sons of every word in the query and expands the query with them.

expandByGrandsons

public org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet expandByGrandsons(org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet query)
Method expandByGrandsons Finds the direct sons and the grandsons (sons of sons) of every word in the query and expands the query with them.

expandByFathers

public org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet expandByFathers(org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet query)
Method expandByFathers Finds the direct fathers of every word in the query and expands the query with them.

expandByGrandfathers

public org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet expandByGrandfathers(org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet query)
Method expandByGrandfathers Finds the direct fathers and the fathers of the fathers (grandfathers) of every word in the query and expands the query with them.

expandDown

private org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet expandDown(org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet query,
                                                           int level)
Method expandDown Expands downwards for every word in the query for 'level' levels.

expandDown

private org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet expandDown(java.lang.String word,
                                                           int level)
Method expandDown Generic method to expande 'level' levels downwards from a string. Ends when a word has no more sons or all sons are already contained in the result.

expandUp

private org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet expandUp(org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet query,
                                                         int level)
Method expandUp Expands upwards for every word in the query for 'level' levels.

expandUp

private org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet expandUp(java.lang.String word,
                                                         int level)
Method expandUp Generic method to expande 'level' levels upwards from a string. Ends when a word has no more fathers or all fathers are already contained in the result (this should not happen with a sane structure, but who knows).

toSet

private org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet toSet(java.sql.ResultSet rs,
                                                      int which)
Method toSet Small method to convert a ResultSet to a CharArraySet taking only the relevant part out of the set (indicated via the number of column by the parameter which)

toList

private java.util.LinkedList toList(java.sql.ResultSet rs,
                                    int which)
Method toList Small method to convert a ResultSet to a LinkedList taking only the relevant part out of the set (indicated via the number of column by the parameter which)
